scene_description_enriched: A group of figures, all with halos, are depicted in a procession. The central figures are bearded men wearing robes. The figure on the far left is looking to the left, while the figure in the center foreground holds a key and a scroll. The figure to the right of him also holds a scroll. The background is a plain, light color, suggesting an outdoor or undefined setting. The figures appear to be saints or apostles, possibly in a scene related to their martyrdom or evangelization.
